name: Impossible Tracks Stunt Car
description:
Are you ready to enjoy ultimate car driving on sky roads by playing Hot Wheels impossible tracks?
Welcome to new Hot Wheels Impossible Tracks game where you can drive amazing cars on massive heights to touch the skies like a legend. Get unique driving experience on impossible tracks by performing crazy stunts on Mega ramps with super Jet cars. Be careful while racing the car to avoid impossible fall.

You will get the feeling of a real stunt rider by playing Hot Wheels Impossible Tracks . Choose your 4x4 car among multiple super Grand luxuries cars with super suspension and realistic breaking physics. To perform crazy stunts, tighten your seat belt and enjoy loads of grand vehicles while climb up the massive heights but try not fall down otherwise you will lose. Dare to be a fearless driver to drive the cars on deadly and impossible roads. Driving on impossible roads with extreme cars needs special training as climbing on massive heights by doing mid-air ramps stunts is a hard drive.

Every level is thrilling and challenging that makes it most exciting car stunt game. Reach to the check point by doing serious stunts but you need to do this really fast to reach the finish line as racing time is limited. Enjoy the fastest and most exhilarating 3D stunts action on un possible path.

Game Features:

- Mid-air stunts and sky high driving tracks
- Sports cars with real stunt cars inside in impossible tracks games.
- Xtreme car stunts and realistic car driving simulation
- New car driving game of 2018 with thrilling new high tracks
- Amazing tracks dangerous sharp turns with jumps and obstacles
- Heavy nitro engine for acceleration for impossible car racing simulator experience
